return.description:
By default an array is returned. If return_float
   is set, then a float is returned.Array keys:
   
    
     
      "sec" - seconds since the Unix Epoch
     
    
    
     
      "usec" - microseconds
     
    
    
     
      "minuteswest" - minutes west of Greenwich
     
    
    
     
      "dsttime" - type of dst correction
